issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement shows the Farm.addAnimal(Animal) method returning a boolean, but in the solution implementation (and likely in the tests) addAnimal is defined with a void return type. This mismatch can confuse students implementing the method strictly according to the UML.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the UML and implementation by changing the UML to specify addAnimal returns void, or adjust the implementation to return boolean (e.g., return animals.add(animal)).
